vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ταβειθά (Rec. Ταβιθά), ἡ (Aram. טַבְיְתָא or טְבִיתָא),
Tabitha: Act.9:36, 40 (cf. Δορκάς).†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.9.36; also called Dorcas at Act.9.36,39;
§ Tabitha, "gazelle"
antelope, Tabitha, (Proper name), Acts 9:36, 40*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
大比大 这个陰性專有名詞在亞蘭文的意思是 "母瞪羚 "
女人的名字, 彼得使其死裡復活
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
大比大 这个阴性专有名词在亚兰文的意思是 "母瞪羚 "
女人的名字, 彼得使其死里复活
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ta-bi-tha, là tiếng A-ram nghĩa là Hoàng Dương. Tên trong tiếng Hy-lạp là Đô-ca. H6646 Ta-bi-tha: Ðô-ca là tiếng Hy-lạp.
